name: Metal Saga
description:
Metal Saga is an action game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Metal Saga on PlayStation 2.
Katsunori Nagashima and Masaru Saitō produced the game. Masato Kimura, Mizuho Sasa and Satoru Komiya directed the game. Satoshi Kadokura scored the game.
